title: The Mind Game
overview: This man has super powers... just look into his eyes and he can read your mind!When Dr. Tastai woke up from surgery after a serious accident He found himself capable of knowing the thoughts of others. Just make eye contact!Then one day he made a mistake being framed in a murder that he did not commit. Tastai was given the maximum penalty: death.  Only he can prove himself innocent.  He will do everything possible to represent the truth for the society to know. The plan to prove the innocence of Tathtai begins!
